CustomField.description: Enforce data backups when executing a Data Template deployment to this Environment. The "Before and after deployment" is the recommended option since it registers a precise snapshot of the deployed records for a simple Data Recovery process if needed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enforce data backups when executing a Data Template deployment to this Environment. The "Before and after deployment" is the recommended option since it registers a precise snapshot of the deployed records for a simple Data Recovery process if needed.
CustomField.label: Data Backup Enforcement
